: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus Prime: Ok. I want you to talk to him again. Try to get some answers. If he seems evasive of your questions, come get me.
 airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Condor::

"My evidence is this"said condor while he showed a leaf "Flicker 
said that I collapsed just outside the main doors, but the last 
thing that I remember is that we left the Mess Hall... What happen 
in that time?, plus I've seen this kind of leafs near of the forest 
that is in the area and not near at base and all those fallen leafs 
are dry and this is fresh... I can swear that this leaf isn't in my 
wings when I was in Mess hall... but after I left Mess hall, I can't 
remember a lot..." Condor paused and said serously "it isn't a proof 
that Flicker is doing something wrong... but it's the evidence that 
something isn't all right"
